title: I am from Hyderabad. Tried from the first day midnight. Since then, its out of stock.
content:
I am from Hyderabad. Tried from the first day midnight. Since then, its out of stock. This is really ridiculous. If stock is unavailable, why to advertise this.
Its really disappointing. After waiting for so long, we get to know Flipkart does not deliver anywherer Or Coming Soon Or Out of Stock...
